name: Leadership & Management
long_desc: This course is a comprehensive advancedlevel study of organizational behavior and management. Topics include a survey of the management functions of planning, organizing, and controlling an introduction to individual and group behavior in organizations an extensive study of motivation and leadership. Major behavioral theories are explored in detail. Practical applications are explored by the use of experiential exercises, case studies, and laboratory discussions. Other topics developed include decisionmaking, communication, responsibility, authority and accountability.
